about_the_game:
Expand the experience of conjuntalia with MecaEnglish the new free content to play with friends, 30 words, a limited time and only you can do it, shows that you know the names of the transport vehicles.

Game Rules
Write on the form the transport vehicle that appears in the image and press return
If the word is correct, you will win and move to the next level, but if the word is incorrect you will lose the game, returning to the main menu.
The game has a time limit per word, which to zero to lose the game, with each word written the time will be shorter.
if you write the 30 words correctly you will win the game.

Words Used
Tank, paragliding, ship, train, ferry, bus, jet, van, boat, taxi, lorry truck, submarine, firetruck, canoe, slider, crane, rocket, crawler, jetpack, bicycle, jet ski, airplane unicycle, dump truck, ambulance, helicopter, motorcycle, school bus, skateboard.

MecaEnglish is a parallel project of conjuntalia for learning English with the theme of transport vehicles.
